Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER PROTECTION

Title: Relates to strengthening consumer consent rules that apply to live and robocall telemarketing calls
Summary: Strengthens consumer consent rules that apply to live and robocall telemarketing calls.
LawCode: Amd ยง399-z, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to strengthening consumer consent rules that apply to live and robocall telemarketing calls
